XPing365
Table of Contents

Namespace XPing365.Sdk.Core.Validators

Classes

Validator

The Validator class is responsible for executing a collection of TestStepHandler objects that are used to validate TestSession object. To use the Validator class, you can create a new instance of the class passing in the concrete instances of the TestStepHandler class for instance HttpStatusCodeValidator and provide such Validator object to RunAsync(Uri, TestSettings, IValidator?, IProgress<TestStep>?, CancellationToken) method.

Interfaces

IValidator

Defines the properties and methods that objects that participate in TestSession validation must implement.
